# This file was generated by
# scripts/copy_from_pqclean/copy_from_pqclean.py


add_compile_options(-march=native)
add_compile_options(-mtune=native) 

if(OQS_ENABLE_SIG_AIGIS)
    set(SRCS ${SRCS} sig_aigis.c aigis_src/aes.c aigis_src/aes256ctr.c aigis_src/Alg.c aigis_src/ntt.c aigis_src/packing.c aigis_src/poly.c aigis_src/polyvec.c aigis_src/randombytes.c aigis_src/rng.c aigis_src/sign.c aigis_src/fips202x4.c aigis_src/keccak4x/KeccakP-1600-times4-SIMD256.c)
endif()

add_library(aigis OBJECT ${SRCS})
target_include_directories(aigis PRIVATE ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/common/pqclean_shims)
